member.summary: Gets a bean with data about the key family for specified dataflow.
member.returns: a StructureBean instance with requested data; the result is never null or incomplete, instead an exception is throwed away if something goes wrong and not all required data is successfully retrieved
member.remarks: The resulted bean will contain exactly one key family, but also will include any concepts and codelists referenced by the key family.

member.name: M:Estat.Nsi.Client.NsiClientValidation.CheckResponse(Org.Sdmxsource.Sdmx.Api.Model.Objects.ISdmxObjects)
member.summary: Check the Status of a QueryStructureResponse.

list.item: If it doesn't exist, do nothing. Maybe there is a bug at the NSI WS implementation so we ignore it hoping that the rest of the message is ok
if the status is Success do nothing.
If the status is Warning only log the messages with warning.
if the status is failure throw an NsiClientException
if Response or response structure are null. An exception is thrown

member.name: T:Estat.Nsi.Client.SDMXWSFunction
member.summary: This enum contains the names of a subset of the web functions as defined in SDMX v2.0 Section 07 Web Services Guidelines

member.name: F:Estat.Nsi.Client.SDMXWSFunction.GetCompactData
member.summary: Obtain Compact Data: This is an exchange invoked by the Query Message, for which the response is data marked up according to the Compact Data Message. The function should be called GetCompactData(Query).

member.name: F:Estat.Nsi.Client.SDMXWSFunction.GetCrossSectionalData
member.summary: Obtain Cross-Sectional Data: This is an exchange invoked by the Query Message, for which the response is data marked up according to the Cross- Sectional Data Message. The function should be called GetCrossSectionalData(Query).

member.name: F:Estat.Nsi.Client.SDMXWSFunction.QueryStructure
member.summary: Query Structural Metadata in Repository: This is an exchange invoked by the QueryStructureRequest message, for which the response is a confirmation in the form of a QueryStructureResponse message. The function should be called QueryStructure(QueryStructureRequest).

member.name: M:Estat.Nsi.Client.Utils.IsTrueString(System.String)
member.summary: This is an utility method that verify if a string text equals "true" constant value The check is done in invariant culture and the string case is ignored. In case the input is null or empty the result is false
member.param: The string that needs to be check
member.returns:
The returned values are:
true in case the string is "true"
false in case the string is null or empty or any other string

member.name: M:Estat.Nsi.Client.Validator.ValidateForCompact(Org.Sdmxsource.Sdmx.Api.Model.Objects.DataStructure.IDataStructureObject)
member.summary: This method checks a dsd for compliance with producing Compact Data. In detail, it checks that if a TimeDimension is present and at least one dimension is frequency dimension. If there is none an error message is returned to the caller
member.param: The of the DSD to be checked
member.returns: The error messages in case of invalid dsd or an empty string in case a valid dsd

member.name: M:Estat.Nsi.Client.XmlProxyUrlResolver.GetEntity(System.Uri,System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Maps a URI to an object containing the actual resource. An override of It will use the if no proxy is set. Else it will create a new and return the response
member.returns: A System.IO.Stream object or null if a type other than stream is specified.
member.param: The current implementation does not use this parameter when resolving URIs. This is provided for future extensibility purposes. For example, this can be mapped to the xlink:role and used as an implementation specific argument in other scenarios.
The type of object to return. The current implementation only returns System.IO.Stream objects.
member.exception: is neither null nor a Stream type.
The specified URI is not an absolute URI.
is null.
There is a runtime error (for example, an interrupted server connection).

member.summary: Setter for NSI Client settings The settings are used for Proxy and HTTP authentication
